homepage.name: Yehuda Shmulevitz
homepage.role: Software Engineer · AI Specialist · Full-Stack Developer
homepage.summary: B.Sc. in Software Engineering with hands-on experience in full-stack development, cloud architectures, and AI-based features. I have built production-grade systems on AWS, real-time web platforms, and complex side projects in Unity, ML, C++, Python, and Linux. I am looking for my next opportunity in Software Development.
homepage.projectsSubtitle: Selected projects that represent my work in full-stack development, cloud, AI, systems programming and game development.
homepage.projectMesayaDesc: A full-stack platform that helps Israeli reservists connect with mentors, discover job opportunities and track their progress. The system supports multiple user roles, secure authentication and a bilingual UI.
homepage.projectMesayaTech: Tech Stack: Node.js, Next.js, AWS (Cognito, DynamoDB, S3, SES, Bedrock), Docker
homepage.projectHeartDesc: Machine-learning pipeline that predicts heart-attack risk based on clinical features. Includes preprocessing, feature scaling, training and performance evaluation.
homepage.projectHeartTech: Tech Stack: Python, Scikit-learn, Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib
homepage.projectWarehouseDesc: Web application for managing equipment lending in a warehouse, with real-time data updates and a modern frontend. This project won 1st place at Azrieli College.
homepage.projectWizardDesc: Third-person arena game with enemy AI, health system, difficulty levels and performance optimization via object pooling. Focused on gameplay design and systems thinking.
homepage.projectWizardTech: Tech Stack: Unity (C#), Physics, Object Pooling, AI
homepage.projectDiskDesc: File system simulation that emulates file operations on a virtual disk, showcasing low-level programming, file handling and system calls.
homepage.projectDiskTech: Tech Stack: C++, File Handling, System Calls
homepage.projectExtDesc: Chrome extension that injects UI controls into Google Search results, enabling users to hide or filter specific results using safe DOM manipulation and dynamic node detection.
homepage.projectExtTech: Tech Stack: JavaScript, DOM APIs, Manifest V3
homepage.toolsText: Beyond my main projects, I build small tools and games to experiment with new ideas, architectures and UI patterns. These are presented as a playground and technical sandbox.
homepage.toolsNote: Mini apps are not production systems, but they reflect curiosity, quick experimentation and continuous learning.
homepage.contactText: I am open to Full-Stack and Software Development roles, as well as positions that combine cloud, AI and scalable web architectures.

GamesHome.gamesHomeSubtitle: A small collection of side games built as experiments in UI, state management and game mechanics. These are not production systems, but they demonstrate curiosity and hands-on practice.
GamesHome.gamesHomeCardWizardDescription: Unity 3D prototype: contains known bugs, built as a learning project for AI, enemies and combat systems.
GamesHome.gamesHomeCardMinesweeperDescription: A classic logic-based grid game focused on deduction and careful planning.
GamesHome.gamesHomeCardSnakeDescription: Real-time snake movement, collision detection and increasing difficulty over time.

snake.title: Snake
snake.subtitle: Use arrow keys or swipe on a smartphone to play

minesweeper.title: Minesweeper
minesweeper.instructions: How to play: left-click to open a cell and right-click to place or remove a flag or on a smartphone, tap briefly to open a cell and long-press to place or remove a flag.
minesweeper.loseMessage: Game Over! You clicked on a mine.

wizardArena.title: Wizard Arena 3D
wizardArena.subtitle: A 3D action prototype built in Unity. The WebGL version is part of a learning project.
wizardArena.instructions: How to play: Control the game with the arrow keys (left, right, forward), use the down arrow for aiming mode, press Space to cast a spell, and press S to activate a defensive shield.
wizardArena.keyboardWarning: This game requires a physical keyboard (touch-only devices like phones or tablets are not supported).
